<t>CREATE TABLE mobile_paymentsystem (payment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL)</t><s>INSERT INTO mobile_paymentsystem (user_id, amount, payment_date) VALUES (1, 50.00, '2022-10-01') ON CONFLICT (user_id) DO UPDATE SET amount = excluded.amount, payment_date = excluded.payment_date;</s>

<t>CREATE TABLE users (id INT PRIMARY KEY, username STRING, email STRING, phone_number STRING, balance DECIMAL);

CREATE TABLE transactions (id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, amount DECIMAL, transaction_date TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE payments (id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT, payment_method STRING, status STRING, amount DECIMAL);</t><s>INSERT INTO users (id, username, email, phone_number, balance) VALUES (1, 'user1', 'user1@example.com', '1234567890', 1000) ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET username=excluded.username, email=excluded.email, phone_number=excluded.phone_number, balance=excluded.balance;</s>

<t>CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    mobile_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE wallets (
    wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    from_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    to_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE payment_methods (
    method_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    method_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);</t><s>UPSERT INTO users (user_id, username, mobile_number) VALUES (1, 'JohnDoe', '123456789') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE username='JohnDoe', mobile_number='123456789';</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    mobile_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE wallets (
    wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    from_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    to_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE payment_methods (
    method_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    method_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);</t><s>upsert into users (user_id, username, mobile_number) values (1, 'johndoe', '123456789') on duplicate key update username='johndoe', mobile_number='123456789';</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    mobile_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE wallets (
    wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00
);

CREATE TABLE payment_methods (
    method_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    method_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    from_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    to_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE

CREATE TABLE payment_methods (
    method_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    method_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    mobile_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL
);</t><s>UPSERT INTO users (user_id, username, mobile_number) VALUES (1, 'JohnDoe', '123456789') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE username='JohnDoe', mobile_number='123456789';</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    from_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    to_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE wallets (
    wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00
);

CREATE TABLE payment_methods (
    method_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    method_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    mobile_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL
);</t><s>upsert into users (user_id, username, mobile_number) values (1, 'johndoe', '123456789') on duplicate key update username='johndoe', mobile_number='123456789';</s>

);</t><s>UPSERT INTO wallets (wallet_id, user_id, balance) VALUES (1, 1, 100.00) ON CONFLICT (wallet_id) DO UPDATE SET balance = 100.00;</s>

    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    from_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    to_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE wallets (
    wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00
);</t><s>UPSERT INTO wallets (wallet_id, user_id, balance) VALUES (1, 1, 100.00) ON CONFLICT (wallet_id) DO UPDATE SET balance = 100.00;</s>

    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    mobile_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL

    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE wallets (
    wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00
);</t><s>UPSERT INTO wallets (wallet_id, user_id, balance) VALUES (1, 1, 100.00) ON CONFLICT (wallet_id) DO UPDATE SET balance = 100.00;</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE payment_methods (
    method_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    method_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    from_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    to_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE payment_methods (
    method_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    method_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    mobile_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL
);</t><s>UPSERT INTO payment_methods (method_id, user_id, method_name) VALUES (1, 1, 'Credit Card') ON CONFLICT (method_id) DO UPDATE SET method_name = 'Credit Card';</s>

    wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),

<t>CREATE TABLE payment_methods (
    method_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    method_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    from_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    to_wallet_id INT REFERENCES wallets(wallet_id),
    amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE wallets (
    wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES users(user_id),
    balance DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0.00
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    mobile_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL
);</t><s>UPSERT INTO payment_methods (method_id, user_id, method_name) VALUES (1, 1, 'Credit Card') ON CONFLICT (method_id) DO UPDATE SET method_name = 'Credit Card';</s>

<t>CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

<t>CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));</t><s>INSERT INTO Users (user_id, username, email, phone_number) VALUES (1, 'john_doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '123-456-7890') ON CONFLICT (user_id) DO UPDATE SET username = 'john_doe_updated', email = 'john.doe@example.com', phone_number = '123-456-7890';</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));</t><s>insert into users (user_id, username, email, phone_number) values (1, 'john_doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '123-456-7890') on conflict (user_id) do update set username = 'john_doe_updated', email = 'john.doe@example.com', phone_number = '123-456-7890';</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

<t>CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));</t><s>insert into users (user_id, username, email, phone_number) values (1, 'john_doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '123-456-7890') on conflict (user_id) do update set username = 'john_doe_updated', email = 'john.doe@example.com', phone_number = '123-456-7890';</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

<t>CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));</t><s>INSERT INTO Users (user_id, username, email, phone_number) VALUES (1, 'john_doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '123-456-7890') ON CONFLICT (user_id) DO UPDATE SET username = 'john_doe_updated', email = 'john.doe@example.com', phone_number = '123-456-7890';</s>

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));</t><s>insert into users (user_id, username, email, phone_number) values (1, 'john_doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '123-456-7890') on conflict (user_id) do update set username = 'john_doe_updated', email = 'john.doe@example.com', phone_number = '123-456-7890';</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

<t>CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));</t><s>insert into users (user_id, username, email, phone_number) values (1, 'john_doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '123-456-7890') on conflict (user_id) do update set username = 'john_doe_updated', email = 'john.doe@example.com', phone_number = '123-456-7890';</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));</t><s>INSERT INTO Users (user_id, username, email, phone_number) VALUES (1, 'john_doe', 'john.doe@example.com', '123-456-7890') ON CONFLICT (user_id) DO UPDATE SET username = 'john_doe_updated', email = 'john.doe@example.com', phone_number = '123-456-7890';</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

<t>CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));</t><s>insert into wallets (wallet_id, user_id) values (1, 1) on conflict (wallet_id) do update set user_id = 1;</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

<t>CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));</t><s>insert into wallets (wallet_id, user_id) values (1, 1) on conflict (wallet_id) do update set user_id = 1;</s>

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

<t>CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));</t><s>INSERT INTO Wallets (wallet_id, user_id) VALUES (1, 1) ON CONFLICT (wallet_id) DO UPDATE SET user_id = 1;</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));</t><s>INSERT INTO Wallets (wallet_id, user_id) VALUES (1, 1) ON CONFLICT (wallet_id) DO UPDATE SET user_id = 1;</s>

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());</t><s>insert into wallets (wallet_id, user_id) values (1, 1) on conflict (wallet_id) do update set user_id = 1;</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

<t>CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());</t><s>insert into wallets (wallet_id, user_id) values (1, 1) on conflict (wallet_id) do update set user_id = 1;</s>

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

<t>CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());</t><s>INSERT INTO Wallets (wallet_id, user_id) VALUES (1, 1) ON CONFLICT (wallet_id) DO UPDATE SET user_id = 1;</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));</t><s>INSERT INTO Wallets (wallet_id, user_id) VALUES (1, 1) ON CONFLICT (wallet_id) DO UPDATE SET user_id = 1;</s>

<t>CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));</t><s>insert into wallets (wallet_id, user_id) values (1, 1) on conflict (wallet_id) do update set user_id = 1;</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

<t>CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));</t><s>INSERT INTO Transactions (transaction_id, sender_wallet_id, receiver_wallet_id, amount, transaction_date) VALUES (1, 1, 2, 100.00, '2023-01-15') ON CONFLICT (transaction_id) DO UPDATE SET sender_wallet_id = 1, receiver_wallet_id = 2, amount = 100.00, transaction_date = '2023-01-15';</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));</t><s>insert into transactions (transaction_id, sender_wallet_id, receiver_wallet_id, amount, transaction_date) values (1, 1, 2, 100.00, '2023-01-15') on conflict (transaction_id) do update set sender_wallet_id = 1, receiver_wallet_id = 2, amount = 100.00, transaction_date = '2023-01-15';</s>

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));</t><s>insert into transactions (transaction_id, sender_wallet_id, receiver_wallet_id, amount, transaction_date) values (1, 1, 2, 100.00, '2023-01-15') on conflict (transaction_id) do update set sender_wallet_id = 1, receiver_wallet_id = 2, amount = 100.00, transaction_date = '2023-01-15';</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));</t><s>INSERT INTO Transactions (transaction_id, sender_wallet_id, receiver_wallet_id, amount, transaction_date) VALUES (1, 1, 2, 100.00, '2023-01-15') ON CONFLICT (transaction_id) DO UPDATE SET sender_wallet_id = 1, receiver_wallet_id = 2, amount = 100.00, transaction_date = '2023-01-15';</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));</t><s>insert into transactions (transaction_id, sender_wallet_id, receiver_wallet_id, amount, transaction_date) values (1, 1, 2, 100.00, '2023-01-15') on conflict (transaction_id) do update set sender_wallet_id = 1, receiver_wallet_id = 2, amount = 100.00, transaction_date = '2023-01-15';</s>
<t>CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());</t><s>INSERT INTO Transactions (transaction_id, sender_wallet_id, receiver_wallet_id, amount, transaction_date) VALUES (1, 1, 2, 100.00, '2023-01-15') ON CONFLICT (transaction_id) DO UPDATE SET sender_wallet_id = 1, receiver_wallet_id = 2, amount = 100.00, transaction_date = '2023-01-15';</s>

<t>CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

<t>CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

<t>CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

<t>CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Cards (card_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, card_number VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, cvv VARCHAR(3) NOT NULL, card_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));

CREATE TABLE Payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT NOT NULL, status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, payment_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES Transactions(transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Users (user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW());

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_wallet_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, transaction_date DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (sender_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id), FOREIGN KEY (receiver_wallet_id) REFERENCES Wallets(wallet_id));

CREATE TABLE Wallets (wallet_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL DEFAULT 0.00, created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES Users(user_id));
